conversations.content: Where and at what time is the hiking trip on Saturday going to be, based on the emails I received? Give me the time in the format 'HH:MM'.

Since the initial trajectory plan has been set to retrieve unread emails, I will proceed with that action next.
</function_thought>

I retrieved the unread emails but found that all the emails I received are already marked as read. However, there is an email from Mark about the hiking trip on Saturday the 18th, where he mentioned meeting at the island trailhead at 8 AM. I can extract the time and location from this email.
